In light of the revealing of the truth of Hillsborough, and the shameful fact that it has taken 23 years for the families of the bereaved to fight for so long for the truth I hereby request that JUSTICE FOR THE 96 is designated an official campaign, comprehensively ensuring the following keys points are addressed:

1. All families of the Hillsborough victims have all requests met in order to seek truth and justice.

2. All Liverpool supporters who attended on 15/04/1989 are apologised to officially for the unacceptable lies and slander.

3. Investigations into the reason why something as simple as the truth has taken so long to be revealed.

It is unacceptable that the families of the 96 were never given the full facts about their loved ones, and even more unforgivable attempts to enquire about the circumstances were blocked.

TRUTH for the 96 established, time for JUSTICE....
